cleaned_text: Choose the synonym for [shelter](https://www.thesaurus.com/e/synonym-of-the-day/) [thesaurus](/) - dose dose [See definition of dose on Dictionary.com](https://www.dictionary.com/browse/dose) synonyms for dose How to use dose in a sentence States and counties receive a certain number of doses to try to meet the needs of their populations, and visitors and nonresidents may edge out others who qualify.
